title: Generative AI might soon face some major copyright limitations from the EU
description: As AI continues to make waves, EU lawmakers are trying to mitigate the risks.

title: Is this the snarkiest AI chatbot so far? I tried HuggingChat and it was weird
description: If you thought Bard was surprising, you should try HuggingChat.

title: Want to learn more about prompt engineering? This free course can help
description: OpenAI and DeepLearning.AI are pairing up to offer training in prompt engineering, but it's only free for a limited time.

title: This $50 desk accessory is a must-have for comfort, whether you sit or stand
description: Vivo's adjustable accessory has become a work essential for me, and your body will thank you for one, too.

title: If vinyl is your jam, you need this $30 brush to keep those records clean
description: To keep your record player stylus clean and your albums like new, this simple-to-use brush is the way to go.

title: ReMarkable's latest update fixes my biggest gripe about the tablet (and possibly yours, too)
description: ReMarkable 2 just got a long overdue feature. Here's how to update your tablet immediately and why you should.

title: YouTube Music adds podcasts: What podcasters and podcast fans need to know
description: Users will be able watch or listen to the podcasts for free -- no subscription required.

title: Microsoft to Windows 10 users: No more feature updates for you
description: The latest data from StatCounter shows Windows 10 with a 73% slice of the market and Windows 11 with a 21% cut. Will this move convince more people to upgrade?

title: How to fix Grammarly not appearing for Google Docs in Safari
description: If you depend on Grammarly to keep your writing clean, and you use Safari, you might find the feature randomly disappears when using it in Google Docs. Here's the fix.

title: I used ChatGPT to write the same routine in these ten obscure programming languages
description: Can ChatGPT program in a language from the 1950s or in one of the languages that wrote its own code? We took a walk down memory lane to find out.

title: OnePlus' first tablet is for Android fans who secretly want an iPad
description: Review: The OnePlus Pad gets a lot of things right, such as performance and battery life, but is ultimately held back by underlying forces.

title: How to use ChatPDF: The AI chatbot that can tell you everything about your PDF
description: Put your time to better use than reading a lengthy PDF. Here's how.
